name: Alb
description:
A tough little platformer made in 1bit.

Use arrows to move.

in this game you can:

  • Fast Fall by pusing down while in the air.
  • Sneak by pushing down on the ground.
  • Sneak jump by pushing up while pushing down on the ground.
  • Stick to wall by pressing the direction towards the wall next to a wall.
  • Wall jump by pushing up next to a wall.
  • Jump away from the wall by pressing the direction opposing the wall while (immediately) releasing the direction towards the wall.

Made in 15 days for the B&W Game Jam

After collecting 4 coins and redoing the game, you will unlock a secret that fits the optionnal theme. You can collect them in one or multiple playthrough.

Thanks to Music for the ill for all of the musics and some sound effects! Here is soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/mfti
